contents.text: Welcome to The Judge Group in San Francisco, your trusted partner for technology, talent, and learning solutions.
If you are a job seeker looking for your next opportunity, press 1.
To speak with a recruiter, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a recruiter who can assist you.

navigationGoals: I need to speak with a recruiter about available tech roles that match my background.
Talk to a recruiter about my military-to-tech career transition.
I want to speak with a recruiter about SaaS backend engineering positions with Kubernetes expertise.
I need to speak with a recruiter about finding a job.
I’d like to speak with a recruiter about entry-level physics positions at tech firms

contents.text: To check your application status, press 2.
Please hold while we retrieve your application status; a team member will be with you shortly.

navigationGoals: I want to check the status of my recently submitted job application.
Check the status of my software engineer application.
Retrieve the status of my application for the DevOps engineer role with AWS and Terraform proficiency.
I want to check the status of my job application.
I’m calling to get an update on my application for the summer physics internship

contents.text: For corporate clients seeking hiring or training solutions, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you with our client services team.

navigationGoals: I need to discuss recruiting services for my company’s open positions.
Discuss recruiting services for my veteran-owned business.
Discuss your end-to-end talent acquisition solutions for scaling our full-stack development team.
I’d like to discuss recruiting services for my company.
I want to discuss setting up recruiting services to hire physics undergraduates for research roles

contents.text: To inquire about our training and learning programs, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you with our learning solutions specialist.

navigationGoals: I’m looking for information on your corporate training and learning programs.
Inquire about leadership training programs for my veteran staff.
Connect me with your learning solutions specialist to explore upskilling programs in cloud-native architectures.
I’m calling to learn more about your training and learning programs.
I’d like details on your training programs tailored for physics students
